content.name: c_example_object.json
content.content:
{
	"localized": true,
	"allowConnections": true,
	"auditing": {
		"enabled": true
	},
	"canCascadeDelete": false,
	"connectionOptions": {
		"requireAccept": false,
		"requiredAccess": 5,
		"sendNotifications": false
	},
	"createAcl": [
		"role.administrator"
	],
	"defaultAcl": [
		"owner.delete",
		"role.administrator.delete"
	],
	"favorite": false,
	"hasETag": false,
	"isDeletable": true,
	"isUnmanaged": false,
	"isVersioned": false,
	"label": "Example Object",
	"name": "c_example_object",
	"description": "An example object",
	"object": "object",
	"objectTypes": [],
	"properties": [
		{
			"acl": [],
			"aclOverride": false,
			"array": false,
			"auditable": false,
			"canPull": true,
			"canPush": true,
			"creatable": false,
			"defaultValue": [],
			"history": false,
			"indexed": true,
			"label": "Example string",
			"maxItems": 100,
			"maxShift": false,
			"maxSize": 0,
			"minItems": 0,
			"name": "c_example_string",
			"optional": false,
			"readAccess": "read",
			"readable": true,
			"removable": false,
			"serializeData": true,
			"type": "String",
			"validators": [],
			"writable": true,
			"writeAccess": "update",
			"writeOnCreate": true
		}
	],
	"shareChain": [
		"share",
		"read",
		"connected"
	]
}

content.name: c_example_lib.json
content.content:
{
	"active": true,
	"configuration": {
		"export": "c_example_lib"
	},
	"description": "This is an example lib",
	"environment": "*",
	"label": "Example Lib",
	"language": "javascript/es6",
	"name": "c_example_lib",
	"object": "script",
	"optimized": false,
	"principal": null,
	"script": "/env/scripts/js/library.c_example_lib.js",
	"type": "library",
	"weight": 0
}
